amendment.description: An amendment numbered 28 printed in Part B of House Report 117-9 to strike Section 4208 of the bill, which expands political record requirements for online platforms.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lesko amendment (A007) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A007) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mrs. Lesko.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lesko amendment (A007) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Lesko amendment (A007) Failed by voice vote.
